episodes.title: Surviving a cult with Amanda Graham
episodes.description:
Networking can be hard for most people... throw in a layer of neurospiciness, and you've got yourself a REAL challenge. 

Amanda Graham is an entrepreneur, consultant, networking expert, and comedy writer, who specializes in helping anyone who may not fit the mold, be that because they’re neurodivergent or grew up low income, succeed. 

Oh, and she's also a cult survivor, something she discussed at length on this week's episode of Rebel Mom Boss. 

To learn more about Amanda and the work that she does, check out her website: https://www.itsamandagraham.com/

If you're interested in working with Robyn, visit her website: https://robynflynn.com/ 

----------

If you're new here, HI! My name is Robyn Flynn, and I'm the host of Rebel Mom Boss, the podcast for scrappy, rebellious moms who are making things happen while raising their babies. I'm also the founder and managing director of Robyn Flynn Media, and a mom, to a beautiful toddler named Peyton.

----------

This podcast is produced by Robyn Flynn Media. Intro music composed and performed by Hadleigh Robertson.
